pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class ReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.ReservationController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/reservation")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class ReservationController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "reservation-management"


    This controller also perform the actions on the reservations.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

        @RequestMapping(value="/reservation-management")
public String showReservationPage(@RequestParam(required=false,name="systemMessage")
                                                                                    String systemMessage,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="customerId")
                                                                                    String reservationCustomerId,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="customerFirstName")
                                                                                    String reservationCustomerFirstName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="customerLastName")
                                                                                    String reservationCustomerLastName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="customerPesel")
                                                                                    String reservationCustomerPesel,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="bookId")
                                                                                    String reservationBookId,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="bookTitle")
                                                                                    String reservationBookTitle,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="startResult")
                                                                                    Integer reservationStartResult,
                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model theModel)
        Returns the view of "reservation-management" with model attributes:
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • startResult - The value of first index of the results
        • reservationList - The list of Reservation objects
        • systemMessage - The one of the system messages
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        Parameters:
        systemMessage - The String containing the system message
        reservationCustomerId - The String containing the id of the user
        reservationCustomerFirstName - The String containing the first name of the user
        reservationCustomerLastName - The String containing the last name of the user
        reservationCustomerPesel - The String containing the PESEL of the user
        reservationBookId - The String containing the id of the book
        reservationBookTitle - The String containing the title of the book
        reservationStartResult - The String containing the The Integer containing the first index of the results
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view
